Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Harvard
ShortDescription: #103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Wentworth, 107th, Halsted, due to street blockage near 103rd/Harvard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Wentworth, 107th, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 103rd, due to street blockage near 103rd/Harvard.

Allow extra travel time.
